statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM customer_data ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_data WHERE subscription_status = 'active' ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT customer_name, age, email_address FROM customer_data WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT customer_name, age, email_address FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE subscription_status = 'Active' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customer_data WHERE age >= 25 ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, subscription_status FROM customer_data WHERE subscription_status = 'Inactive' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, subscription_status FROM customer_data WHERE age < 40 ORDER BY customer_name, subscription_status ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, name, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE age < 25 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT segment_name, description FROM customer_segments;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_customers FROM customers;
SELECT name, age, segment_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_segments s ON c.customer_id = s.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE description LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customers ORDER BY customer_location DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_gender FROM customers WHERE customer_gender = 'F';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_gender = 'F';
SELECT customers.customer_name, purchase_history.product_name, purchase_history.purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, segment_name, segment_description FROM customers JOIN customer_segments ON customers.customer_id = customer_segments.segment_id ORDER BY customer_name DESC, segment_name;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT product_name, price FROM purchases ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT segment_name FROM customer_segments WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, purchase_id FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE promotion_id > 100;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments ORDER BY segment_name ASC;
